An order of adjudication was passed on 19th July

. 

The 

Official 
Assignee 
had 
declared 
the

and

to 
the 
unsecured 
creditors 
of 
.100 
ps. 

in

a 

rupee 
on 
th 
November 
. 

At 
present 
cash 
balance 
of

account. In the present case, no further recoveries are

.

The Official Assignee has prayed that the cash

balance 

in 

hand 

may 

be 
transferred 

to 

the 

unclaimed

dividend 

capital 

account 

under

of

Bombay

Insolvency 

Rules, 
and 
thereafter, 
to 
the 

unclaimed

dividend capital revenue account and the account may be

closed for administrative purposes.

.

Having regard to the circumstances set out in the

of

Official 
Assignee, 
there 
is 
no 
reason 

why

should 
not 
be 
granted. 

Prayer 
clause 
(a) 

of

the report of the Official Assignee is accordingly
